snippet: Three members of the Russian feminist punk band Pussy Riot were found guilty on Friday over a stunt they staged in February, and China is following a Western template with the hope to bolster its image and influence around the world.
abstract: Three members of the Russian feminist punk band Pussy Riot were found guilty on Friday over a stunt they staged in February, and China is following a Western template with the hope to bolster its image and influence around the world.

headline.main: The Breakfast Meeting: Guilty Verdicts in Pussy Riot Case, and China's Media Strategy
